synopsis.text: Whether it's the mystery of her mother's growing belly, the unexpected arrival of her first period, or the unfamiliar flutters she experiences around boys, fifth-grader Tsubomi Tachibana is navigating the uncharted waters of puberty. As she courageously confronts these new challenges, Tsubomi, alongside her friends, embarks on a journey of self-discovery, learning valuable lessons about love, life, and growing up. Join Tsubomi and her companions as they experience the rollercoaster of emotions and changes that come with stepping into adolescence, and uncover the true meaning of maturity.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
